name: One chance at surviving
description:
A Quest 2 PCVR game where you need to escape from enemy territory and to deliver a message to allies by shooting a flare in the air on an extraction point. Each items can be used once(Except Debug Banana) including your only flare gun.

Development might continue on if well supported.

Made in Unreal engine 5, most assets are from Quixel Megascans

Game is :~600MB.

It is my first published game so don't expect near 0 issues.

Heavy on performance so if your PC does not run it well, consider activating lower performance landscape in the menu at your left

(High Quality) GTX 1660TI - 60 FPS no lag

Contact me at my discord: united steaks of america#1350
